import React from 'react'; const AboutUs = () => { return (
{/* Header Section */}

About Us

Learn more about Event Hub and what we do

{/* Main Content */}
{/* Image Section */}
{/* Text Section */}

Our Mission

At Event Hub, our mission is to provide a seamless and enjoyable event management experience. We aim to help you create, manage, and enjoy your events without any hassle.

Whether you are organizing a small gathering or a large conference, our platform is designed to meet all your needs. Join us and experience the future of event management.

Thank you for choosing Event Hub. We look forward to helping you make your events successful and memorable.

); }; export default AboutUs;
